thread.title: Cam'Ron Responds to Jim Jones' Tearful Interview
thread.title_full: Cam'Ron Responds to Jim Jones' Tearful Interview | Complex

author: Daniel Barna
title: Cam'Ron Responds to Jim Jones' Tearful Interview
text:
Cam'ron Responds to Jim Jones' Tearful Interview By Daniel Barna   Image via Getty/Johnny Nunez As promised, Cam'ron went live on Instagram on Saturday, in response to Jim Jonesâ€™ tearful interview , in which he discussed the fractured relationship between himself and his former Dipset brethren.
In the interview with Hot 97â€™s Funkmaster Flex , Jones recalled the beginnings of his friendship with Cam, and by the sound of it, they were thick as thieves. â€œ Before I got all the pieces together, I was everything; I was the hypeman, I was the road manager, I was the manager, I was the security," he said. "Everything you could name, I was it for Cam."
Related Jim Jones Gets Emotional About Dipset: 'I Put Everything On The Line For This' Ballin'! Jim Jones Signs With Roc Nation (UPDATED) Video: Jim Jones Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex At Flight Club NYC Jones went on to elaborate on the rise and fall of the seminal Harlem rap group, and hinted towards some personal indiscretions on Cam'ronâ€™s part. Of course, Cam took issue with Jonesâ€™ comments, promising an epic response to the interview.
  Traveling 2day.. So 2mr it is.. Have a extra phone or computer.. So u can goggle what I'm talking bout.. While I'm talking.. Cause crying don't meant it's the truth lol. ðŸ˜œ#IdontDoFiction 
A photo posted by @mr_camron on Feb 10, 2017 at 12:18pm PST
â€œIma go live 2mr night at 9pm.." Cam'ron posted on Instagram "I ain't gonna be [crying emoji] either." So what exactly did Cam have to say?
Cam'ron opened his livestream dancing with his fiancÃ©e Juju to R. Kelly's "Happy People." Once it hit 9 p.m. on the dot, Cam got to business. With a can of Pepsi and seated comfortably at his desk, he begins with speaking about his history growing up in Harlem, meeting Mase, and how his friendship with Jim Jones came about. You can tune in live here .
